decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: MR.130A-SP-A-00.00-D-Location Plan, MR.130A-SP-A-00.01-D-Existing Site Plan, MR.130A-GF-A-00.02-D-Existing Ground Floor Plan, MR.130A-FF-A-00.03-D-Existing First Floor Plan, MR.130A-R-A-00.04-D-Existing Roof Plan, MR.130A-ZZ-A-00.21-D-Existing Elevations, MR.130A-ZZ-A-00.22-D-Existing Elevations, MR.130A-ZZ-A-00.41-D-Existing Sections, MR.130A-SP-A-20.01-E-Proposed Site Plan, MR.130A-GF-A-20.02-G-Proposed Ground Floor Plan, MR.130A-FF-A-20.03-G-Proposed First Floor Plan, MR.130A-L-A-20.04-G-Proposed Loft Plan, MR.130A-R-A-20.05-G-Proposed Roof Plan, MR.130A-ZZ-A-20.06-D-Proposed Parking Plan, MR.130A-ZZ-A-20.21-E-Proposed Elevations, MR.130A-ZZ-A-20.22-E-Proposed Elevations, MR.130A-ZZ-A-20.41-G-Proposed Sections, MR.130A-ZZ-A-30.01-D-Existing and Proposed Areas, MR.130A-ZZ-A-30.21-D-Existing and Proposed Street Scene, MR.130A-ZZ-A-30.22-D-Existing and Proposed Street Scene,

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those detailed in the submitted application form and approved drawings and documents listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023). | The hereby approved rooflights to the roof slopes of the hereby approved development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the  area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Alterations to the fenestration; replacement of windows; first floor side/rear extension; alteration of roof to raise ridge height; rear roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony, and installation of two roof lights to front roofslope.
